plot: Jo & Meg's life in New York was different before joining Sei's band of mercenaries in Tokyo. After leaving Shierly with her new family, Jo & Meg continued to live on in the city, but suddenly Meg's little friend Shierly was hospitalized after being attacked by a cyborg controlled by a maniac who lust on filming down of victims wounded or worse killed by his cyborg. Now his target next is Meg...
